short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that forces codes wrapping on GitHub (only github.com). It applies to the part written ``` in markdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Especially when pasting access logs and error logs on GitHub Issues, they will be displayed long horizontally.
This extension wraps them.
